title: Invitalia - Wikipedia
snippet: Possiede tre uffici principali a Roma, in Via Calabria 46, sede centrale, Via Pietro Boccanelli 12 - 30 e Viale Europa 172 (presso il Ministero delle imprese e del made in Italy). Il Gruppo Invitalia possiede ulteriori uffici territoriali a Rieti, Foligno, Teramo, Ascoli Piceno, Serrapetrona, ...

title: Invitalia Company Overview, Contact Details & Competitors | LeadIQ

title: Invitalia - Overview, News & Similar companies | ZoomInfo.com
snippet: Invitalia is a national development agency that manages all national incentives that favor the creation of new businesses and finances large and small projects. They are headquartered in Rome, Italy....

title: Invitalia Information
snippet: Invitalia is an International Trade and Development, Cities, Towns & Municipalities General, and Association company located in Rome, Latium with $19.8 million in revenue and 16 employees.

title: Invitalia - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
snippet: Invitalia, the National Agency for inward investment promotion and enterprise development, is mandated by the Italian government to increase the country's competitiveness, particularly in the South, and to support strategic sectors for development.
